patchDVI 1.11.0

  • Reference

Function reference

All functions

DVIspecials() setDVIspecials()
Get and set DVI specials
SweaveAll() knitAll() renderAll()
Apply Sweave to a collection of files.
SweaveMiktex() SweavePDFMiktex() SweaveDVI() SweavePDF() SweaveDVIPDFM()
Simple function to run MikTeX
defSconcordance() useknitr()
Support for non-Sweave concordances.
html_documentC() html_vignetteC() pdf_documentC()
R Markdown drivers to add concordance
html_with_concordance() pdf_with_concordance()
Convert an R Markdown driver to one that handles concordances.
knitInRStudio()
Trigger processing of chapter files from RStudio.
knitMiktex() knitPDFMiktex() knitDVI() knitPDF() knitDVIPDFM()
Knit a File and Patch
needsPackages()
Check for and optionally install packages used by document.
patchDVI() patchSynctex()
patch Sweave source references into .dvi file
patchLog()
Patch a LaTeX log file.
processConcordance()
Get the concordance from the datapos values and record it in a file.
readDVI()
Demo function to read a .dvi file
renderMiktex() renderPDFMiktex() renderDVI() renderPDF() renderDVIPDFM()
Simple functions to render a Markdown file and run it through LaTeX

Developed by Duncan Murdoch.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.6.
